meanings.definition: To be bothered or concerned about something.
meanings.sent1: She really arsed about her upcoming exam.
meanings.sent2: I arsed about the safety of my pet.
meanings.sent3: He arsed about missing his favorite TV show.
meanings.sent4: The constant rain arsed about the picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise outside arsed about my concentration.

meanings.definition: To put effort or energy into something.
meanings.sent1: They arsed to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: I arsed to improve my fitness level.
meanings.sent3: She arsed to bake a perfect cake for the party.
meanings.sent4: The team arsed to win the championship.
meanings.sent5: He arsed to learn a new language fluently.

meanings.sent1: The constant noise really arsed him.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy arsed the older dog.
meanings.sent4: The buzzing mosquito arsed everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The broken doorbell arsed the homeowner.
